name: Omega-3
description:
We made Omega-3 for Ludum Dare - we didn't have enough time to finish but we want to keep working on it until we get it to where we actually wanted it to be for this jam.

Open the phone and buy the first fish to start! Your car is powered by your fish keeping skills, take care of the fish while driving, their stats decide how fast your car goes.

WASD to move the car, mouse for the fish tank side. There was going to be interactions with fish and such but it is not finished at this time so right now you can drive and collect fish that will make your speed go up faster. 

Programming - NekoMkII | Art - Muffy and Cloud
